basics.name: Srinivasa Sai Chava
basics.label: M.S. Artificial Intelligence Student
basics.summary: Graduate student in Artificial Intelligence at Boston University specializing in machine learning, NLP, and computer vision with a focus on explainable and socially responsible AI.

work.name: Datavalley.ai
work.summary: Conducted hands-on ML and Flutter workshops across partner colleges; mentored student teams through end-to-end project deployment.
highlights: Built and demoed a production-grade Flutter app with role-based auth, ZegoCloud video, and UPI payments.

work.name: IIIT Dharwad
work.position: Team Lead, AI-Driven Text Analytics (MT Evaluation)
work.summary: Led comparative evaluation of Google Translate vs. AI4Bharat’s IndicTrans2 on IIT Bombay multilingual datasets.
highlights: Implemented STS-based evaluation; showed IndicTrans2 preserved semantic nuance better for Indian languages.

work.name: Upwork (Freelance)
work.summary: Delivered prototypes in computer vision and automation.
highlights: Basic market-data trading bot with real-time signals (Python).

volunteer.organization: Google Developer Students Club, IIIT Dharwad
volunteer.summary: Led ML and app development initiatives; organized workshops and hackathons.
highlights: Community engagement, peer mentoring, and technical sessions.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology Dharwad

publications.name: IIITDWD_SVC@DravidianLangTech-2024: Breaking Language Barriers; Hate Speech Detection in Telugu-English Code-Mixed Text
publications.summary: Shared-task paper on hate-speech detection in code-mixed Indian languages; co-authored with Rangoori Kumar, Sunil Saumya, and Shankar Biradar.

projects.name: Boston Bus Equity
projects.summary: Analyzing MBTA bus performance and equity by correlating ridership/reliability with community demographics; building predictive models for delay risk.

projects.name: RAG-Assisted Explainable Hate Speech Detection
projects.summary: Multilingual pipeline integrating QLoRA fine-tuning with RAG to produce grounded hate-speech predictions and explanations; reduced hallucinations by ~60%.

projects.name: FakeHate – Multitask Fake News + Hate Speech
projects.summary: Joint model for fake news and hate speech on multilingual social media; improved Hate F1 to 97.15 and Fake F1 to 76.21.

projects.name: Advanced Currency Recognition & Validation
projects.summary: Counterfeit detection using Hu Moments, Haralick texture, color histograms, BoVW, and Random Forest; designed for mobile integration.

projects.name: Enhanced Hyperspectral Image Classification
projects.summary: Two-stream CNN with spatial–spectral features and data augmentation; achieved SOTA-level accuracy on benchmarks.
